text: 3. Your reduction maps instances (G, K) of Vertex Cover to instances (C, Sh, ..., Sk, b) of CS. Show that G has a vertex cover of size at most K if and only if in the mapped instance (C, Sy, ..., Sk, b), there is a set of courses of size at most b such that every student can take a course that interests them. (Remember that you need to two parts here, one for ”if” and one for ”only if’.)
